newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ 84-day T-bills yield 7.805 percent at tender.
newsitem.headline: NZ 84-day T-bills yield 7.805 percent at tender.

text.p: The weighted average yield for NZ$75 million of 84-day treasury bills at Tuesday's tender was 7.805 percent versus 8.195 percent for the NZ$75 million of a similar maturity at last week's tender, the Reserve Bank said.
The average yield for NZ$75 million of 175-day bills was 7.581 percent versus 7.854 percent for the $75 million of similar treasury bills at the last tender.
The average yield for $50 million of 364-day bills was 7.654 percent versus 7.707 percent for the $50 million of similar treasury bills tendered last week.
